ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.2"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67660-1" EMS dispatch Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10556)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Dispatch" (CONF:10558)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10991)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Emergency Medical Dispatch Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.73)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10993)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Complaint Reported By Dispatch (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.74)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Complaint Reported By Dispatch (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.74)
